image_prompts.title: Hebimimi Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Anime-style portrait of a serpent girl with sleek black hair, slitted eyes, and faint snake scale patterns along her neck. She wears a simple dark green dress. Light gradient background.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: snakes instead of hair, full body snake tail, fantasy background, ornate clothing, glitch effects, malformed anatomy

image_prompts.title: Shikamimi Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Deer-eared anime girl with soft brown hair and small antlers. She wears a light tan short-sleeve dress, appearing gentle and shy. Clean background.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: deer legs, fantasy setting, elaborate clothing, glitch effects, malformed anatomy

image_prompts.title: Koumori Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Bat-themed anime girl with short black hair, wide eyes, and pointed bat ears. Wearing a simple black t-shirt. Pale skin and a faint smirk. Light neutral background.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: bat wings, oversized ears, full fantasy costume, glitch effects, malformed anatomy

image_prompts.title: Umamimi Girl 1
image_prompts.description: Horse-eared anime girl with long brown hair and upright ears. She wears a plain grey dress and carries a calm, steady expression. Simple portrait framing.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: horse nose, tail in frame, racing outfit, glitch effects, malformed anatomy

image_prompts.title: Kitsunemimi Girl 4
image_prompts.description: Fox-eared anime girl with red hair and intelligent eyes. Wearing a basic white dress with no accessories. Calm pose, clean background, polished rendering.

image_prompts.title: Inumimi Girl 4
